title: Show the statement of carpet area of every apartment or any unit along with areas of balconies and d
clause_text: Show the statement of carpet area of every apartment or any unit along with areas of balconies and double height terraces, if any, attached to the said unit; Show the use or occupancy of all parts of the buildings; Show exact location of essential services, such as water closet (W.C.), bath, sink and the like;

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Show the statement of carpet area of every apartment or any unit along with areas of balconies and double height terraces, if any, attached to the said unit;
